mapper.select: SELECT CB.NO AS BOARD_NO, CB.MEMBER_NO, CB.CONTENT, M.NICK, CB.ENROLL_DATE, CB.DEL_YN, COUNT(CL.MEMBER_NO) AS LIKES_COUNT FROM COMMT CB JOIN MEMBER M ON CB.MEMBER_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN COMMT_LIKE CL ON CB.NO = CL.COMMT_NO WHERE CB.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CB.NO, CB.MEMBER_NO, CB.CONTENT, M.NICK, CB.ENROLL_DATE, CB.DEL_YN ORDER BY LIKES_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT C.NO AS NO, M.NICK AS NICK, C.CONTENT, C.ENROLL_DATE, MT.TITLE AS MEMBER_TITLE , C.DEL_YN, C.MEMBER_NO, C.BOARD_NO, I.PHOTO AS ICON, COUNT(CL.MEMBER_NO) AS LIKES_COUNT FROM COMMT C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN ICON I ON M.ICON_NO = I.NO JOIN MEMBER_TITLE MT ON M.MEMBER_TITLE_NO = MT.NO LEFT JOIN COMMT_LIKE CL ON C.NO = CL.COMMT_NO WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} GROUP BY C.NO, M.NICK, C.CONTENT, C.ENROLL_DATE, C.DEL_YN, C.MEMBER_NO, C.BOARD_NO, I.PHOTO, MT.TITLE ORDER BY C.NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMT ( NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NO, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{boardNo}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO COMMT ( NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NO, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, PARENT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{boardNo}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{parentNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMT SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT C.NO, M.NICK AS NICK, C.CONTENT, C.DEL_YN, C.ENROLL_DATE FROM COMMT C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.PARENT_NO = #{parentNo} ORDER BY C.ENROLL_DATE DESC
